skills.name: Scarab Go
skills.description: Khepri rolls forward, knocks back all enemy units along the path, and attacks 4 times, each time dealing DMG equal to 100% of ATK.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG dealt to 110%. (Unlocks at Lv.41)
upgrades.level3: Gains 300 Energy on entry. (Unlocks at Lv.141)
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG dealt to 120%. (Unlocks at Lv.221)

skills.name: Scarab Charge
skills.description: Upon entering battle, Khepri quickly rolls forward and slams into the target, dealing DMG equal to 270% of ATK and knocking them back 3 meters.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG dealt to 300%. (Unlocks at Lv.21)
upgrades.level3: Targets who are knocked back also launch units along the path. (Unlocks at Lv.161)
upgrades.level4: Gains a shield equal to 200% of ATK. (Unlocks at Lv.241)

skills.name: Sandstorm Crush
skills.description: Khepri commands a scarab to slam the ground, dealing DMG equal to 200% of ATK to surrounding units. He gains a shield equal to 60% of ATK Ã— (1 + number of units hit).

upgrades.level2: Shield Strength increases to 75% ATK. (Unlocks at Lv.121)
upgrades.level3: Reduces the target's Hit Rate by 20% for 6s. (Unlocks at Lv.201)
upgrades.level4: Each unit hit grants an extra 10% Hit Rate RED, lasting 6s. (Unlocks at Lv.281)

skills.name: Scarab's Blessing
skills.description: Khepri hides himself inside the scarab and cannot act. Casting the skill grants him a shield equal to 300% of ATK and 10% DMG RED for 5s. He gains Super Armor during the skill.

upgrades.level3: Shield Strength increases to 350% ATK. (Unlocks at Lv.181)
upgrades.level4: Also restores 6% of max HP per sec for the duration. (Unlocks at Lv.261)

passive.name: Scarab Charge
passive.description: Upon entering battle, Khepri quickly rolls forward and slams into the target, dealing DMG equal to 270% of ATK and knocking them back 3 meters.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG dealt to 300%. (Unlocks at Lv.21)
upgrades.level3: Targets who are knocked back also launch units along the path. (Unlocks at Lv.161)
upgrades.level4: Gains a shield equal to 200% of ATK. (Unlocks at Lv.241)

relic.name: Scarab's Watch
relic.description: Increases DMG RED of Scarab's Blessing to 60%.

upgrades.level2: Before falling, becomes immune to the DMG and triggers Scarab's Blessing. (Unlock at Relic Lv.10)
upgrades.level3: Increases DMG RED of Scarab's Blessing to 100%. (Unlock at Relic Lv.20)
upgrades.level4: Increases the max HP restored during Scarab's Blessing to 10%. (Unlock at Relic Lv.30)
